characters.name: Butterbean
characters.message: Hi! I'm Butterbean. Let’s explore how to stay safe online together!

characters.name: Nadia
characters.message: Hi! I'm Nadia. I enjoy discovering new things online. Let’s learn how to stay smart and safe!

characters.name: Toni
characters.message: Hi! I'm Toni. I like making videos, but I want to make sure I share the right things!

characters.name: Mateo
characters.message: Hi! I'm Mateo. Sometimes when I use my phone, I get a little confused because I’m not sure what I can share and what I shouldn’t share. Can you help me?
